content.rendered:
Freight forwarding
provides comprehensive air & sea freight services for a diverse range of cargo types
Click Here
Global Fulfilment
End-to-end global fulfilment services, managing every aspect of your supply chain.
Click Here
ICT Logistics
Logistics solutions for the ICT industry, ensuring compliance and efficient handling of technology hardware.
Click Here
iOR/EOR
we enable you to import your technology hardware on a global scale, meeting all compliance requirements.
Click Here
Compliance
We specialises in services outside of the day-to-day requirements of customs clearance and importation.
Click Here

Singapore Logistics Services

  1. Home

Continously Moving Forward

Freight forwarder Singapore, TrueLog provides expert logistics services to enhance your shipping experience.

FREIGHT FORWARDING

Comprehensive sea and air freight services ensuring safe, efficient transportation.
Learn more

GLOBAL FULFILMENT

Efficient, end-to-end supply chain management ensuring timely and accurate worldwide delivery.
Learn more

ICT LOGISTICS

Specialized logistics solutions for technology hardware, ensuring compliance and efficiency.
Learn more

IOR/EOR

Streamlined importer and exporter services ensuring global compliance for IT
equipment.
Learn more

COMPLIANCE

Specialized logistics solutions for technology hardware, ensuring compliance and efficiency.
Learn more

Connect with Our Experts Today!

Schedule a call, book a meeting, or reach out with your questions—we’re here to help.
Get a Free Consultation

Your Industry, Our Expertise: Global Freight Forwarding Solutions

Trucking

Efficient Trucking Solutions: Trucking is reliable and flexible movement of goods.

Trucking

TrueLog offers reliable trucking solutions including FTL, LTL, refrigerated, and cross-border services, ensuring safe and efficient transport.
Read More

Breakbulk

We provides customized breakbulk services, including police escorts and out-of-gauge transportation.

Breakbulk

TrueLog offers comprehensive breakbulk services, featuring police escorts, low bed trucking, night deliveries, choking and lashing, and out-of-gauge transportation.
Read More

Dangerous Goods (DG)

TrueLog specializes in safe, compliant shipping of Class 9 hazardous cargo and batteries.

Dangerous Goods (DG)

TrueLog ensures safe, compliant shipping of Class 9 batteries and hazardous cargo with full regulatory adherence and competitive rates.
Read More

Testimonials

What they say about us

"Aakash DhunaHad a wonderful experience working with TrueLog. - highly recommend!"
Aakash Dhuna
"I was very impressed with the whole process and all of the staff that were involved behind the scenes in making all the deliveries run so smoothly.."
Melissa J. T
"TrueLog has been instrumental in streamlining our global shipping operations. Their sea freight services are top-notch, ensuring our goods arrive on time and in perfect condition. The team’s expertise in handling complex shipments has been invaluable to our business."
James LOperations Manager
